TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GremlinDatabaseResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing a GremlinDatabase along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetGremlinDatabaseResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetGremlinDatabase method.
